strapiPost.title: New Adventure Race Coming To NWA
strapiPost.content:
There's going to be a new race on the Adventure Racing World Series (AWRS) calendar next year, and it will be in Northwest Arkansas.

  • Showcase: The ARWS is a multi-day, multi-discipline race that attracts the best racers from around the world and showcases the most beautiful parts of each participating country. The race in NWA will be called the Expedition Ozark race and will be yet another international stage for the Ozark region after the Cyclo-Cross Championships in Fayetteville.
  • On the way: The Expedition Ozark race will be a World Championship qualifier and one of only four races in the AWRS World Circuit held in North America. The NWA adventure will be April 3-8, 2023. 

Read the KNWA story HERE.
